channel.title: Anyone want thier server dedicated by me? one person only! get posting!
channel.description:
Hey guys im giving one person the chance to have their server dedicated by me. ill run their server on my vps that i purchaced not long ago. alothough when i run it.. i might need some donations.. if thats possible.. but not needed..anyway the server will be run with these features:
[u]Features:[/u] [b]24-7 Uptime[/b] Will be [b]permanently online [/b] even whilst server updates. I can code [b]very well [/b] (sorry if im big headed) so i can help out quite a bit. the vps can hold up to [b]200 players [/b] with only [b]slight lagg[/b].. i will be [b]advertising[/b] inalot of places to increase the game rate. also i will create a [b]website[/b] for the person who would like me to host for them.
[u]What have you done before?[/u] Well i have hosted about 3 servers before for previous owners. tobias summon-pkz and killazpkaz.. they run very smoothly and i turned out pretty successfull for it..
If you want this oppertunity.. please pm me or email/instant message me on
suzuki-rm@hotmail.co.uk
and i will get back to you as soon as possible..
